title: Digital Product Passport
description: Schema for the DPP that validates core headers.

digitalProductPassportId.description: The unique identifier of an instance of the digital product passport.

uniqueProductIdentifier.description: A unique string of characters for the identification of a product. Formatted according to EN18219.

granularity.description: The level of granularity of the ProductID as per ESPR.

dppSchemaVersion.description: The reference standard the DPP instance schema refers to.

dppStatus.description: The status of the DPP instance as digital resource.

lastUpdate.description: The date and time of the latest update to the DPP instance. ISO 8601-1:2019/Amd 1:2022

hsCode.description: The customs tariff number (e.g., HS Code, TARIC code) used for international trade classification.
